inclusion.criterion: urinary retention due to obstructive benign prostatic hyperplasia
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: indwelling urinary catheter for at least 1 month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least one failure of a trial without catheter despite alpha-blocker treatment for at least 72 hours
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: informed about alternative treatment (transurethral resection of the prostate, laser prostatectomy, prostatic adenomectomy)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of relevant neurological disease (e.g. multiple sclerosis, spinal cord injury, parkinson's disease)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: chronic persistent local pathology that may cause urinary symptoms (e.g. interstitial cystitis, tumor, bladder stone)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: renal insufficiency stage 3 or 4 (creatinine clearance < 35 mL/min)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: any allergy or contraindication to ciprofloxacin or drugs used in this protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: any allergy to intravenous contrast agent or iodine
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and multiple prior admissions for UTIs. He also has non-hodgkins Marginal Zone Lymphoma of the left orbit and SLE with transverse myelitis.
